enhanced_by.reason: Both methods modify the internal state of the map by adding or removing key-value pairs.
Both methods involve checking the presence of a key in the map, which can be used to set up the test scenario.
The result of the remove method can be compared with the result of the get method before and after the removal to verify the correctness.
The size method can be used to verify that the size of the map decreases by one after a successful removal.
